hadiths.text: Abu al-Aliya said:The son of the uncle of your Prophet (ﷺ), i. e. Ibn Abbas, reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying: It is not meet for a servant that he should say: I am better than Yunus b. Matta (and this Matta) is the name of his father

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي ذِكْرِ يُونُسَ عَلَيْهِ السَّلاَمُ وَقَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " لاَ يَنْبَغِي لِعَبْ
chapter.eng-name: Yunus, Peace Be Upon Him, And The Words Of The Prophet (ﷺ): "No One Should Say: I Am Better Than Yunus Bin Matta."
